name: Kyle England
text: This is actually a Dutch Bros coffee now. They did a soft opening tonight, and the staff and drinks are great! Will definitely be going here a lot

name: Robert Tanner
text: I put in an order at 10pm and when I picked it up, the guys working were super cool with me and didn’t seem bothered at all how late I was making them work. They also gave me a survey card that gets me free cinnamon sticks next time I go …More

name: Ben Siegel
text: I know its just pizza, but Wow! Pizza hut, I swore off you folks for quite a while. Had pretty bad experiences time after time from my local store; you guys even reached out and comped my order, free pizzas next time blah blah, and …More

name: Lauren Rain
text: We've ordered many, many times from this Pizza Hut because it's the closest to us. We've had maybe 2 or 3 orders actually be decent quality. We have had numerous terrible pizzas, cold, like they made them hours ago and sat them under a heat …More

name: Pat Dougherty
text: Ordered deep dish supreme.  Count the number of pepperoni per slice, or the pieces of green pepper  per slice.  "1" - really!  for $5.00 more I would really like more toppings on my pizza.  It has been years since I have had Pizza Hut.   Very Very disappointed.  Why do you not create a good product!!!!!  Done here....

name: Kim Orris
text: We bought the ultimate dinner box. $28 for a ton of crust. There was barely any toppings on most of the slices. The hot wings were dry and definitely old. Marinara was loaded with sugar. The bread stix were ok. This was the ultimate dinner fail!

name: Primo Zimo
text: Every time, every order, its a crust pizza! Idk why but this location half or more of the pie is crust. Every time,  the dominos in this town is nothing but cheese and this pizza hut is nothing but crust.  Since the dominos is serving …More

name: natchu72
text: Well of course I love this place!!!  The atmosphere is lively and the store is SOOOOOOOOO CLEAN!!! Great team members to work with!  Employees with smiles and a warm greeting is what you find walking through the door. Hot pizza spiced right …More

name: Glen Fiddich
text: This is what we get delivered, and the driver was 30 minutes late to boot. Go to the store and the General Manager is incredibly condescending. Does not know how to handle customers and should be out of a job.

name: Hannah Baumann
text: They always are so friendly and make sure that you don't just feel like another ticket number.

name: Philip E
text: Got a dinner box that was ordered online and payed extra for mozzarella sticks in place of bread sticks but only get bread sticks. Tasted good and prepared promptly

name: colleen wendt
text: I've given this place 3 tries now. Garbage everytime.   Only place worse I've found is big daddy's.

name: jacob bertapelle
text: Oh man! This place just saved my mental health! Thank you guys so much! 4/18/2020.

text: Have ordered from here many times. They now tell me an hoir and a half after i order that im out of there zone. They had my name on the book with adress so yhey know ive ordered from them before but cant tonight. And they tell me so late after dinner so we have nothing for food tonight. Awfull!

name: Sarah Evans
text: Great staff and amazing food

name: charmaine hunter
text: Got our pizzas within time and the delivery lady was AMAZING AND SUPER SWEET. Then we started to eat the pizza i thought because im pregnant my taste buds where just off so my husband tried it and was like what is that, then my daughter …More

name: Hannah Baumann
text: Always so friendly and great service/quality

name: Aleks Delia
text: called to order a pizza for dinner at 7:30 and the man who answered the phone said they were closed.... at 7:30 pm.... dinner time.... …More

name: Amber Haynes
text: The store manager needs to learn how to talk to the customers. You should never talk to ANYONE the way he talked to my mom when we went there to get q couple of pizzas'. As she and I were leaving he rudely asked his workers "What's HER problem?" I went back in there and told him off.

name: Everyday Average mf
text: Some of the worst management I've ever seen. An old, mean looking bald guy was yelling at a bunch of teenagers the last time I was there. The disgusting floors and obviously tainted bathroom made me think twice about ordering. Gross. Will never go back.

name: Matoya T
text: Would've given more stars if I didn't have to wait 25 minutes for my carry out that was suppose to take 20 minutes from the time I ordered. I would suggest that the employees wear gloves. No one had on gloves. I'm not sure of Pizza Hut's policy but they could benefit from wearing gloves while preparing food. Decent service.

name: ben geiger
text: Only been inside a couple times but delivery is good and nice people. Never had a complaint but it's nothing special. I like this place more than other pizza places near me

name: Vinny Salsberg
text: Jeff was awesome tonight! I ordered garlic knots with my pizza but they ran out, Jeff went out of his way to make up for it. I greatly appreciate customer service that goes above and beyond and because of that great customer service this will be my go to pizza hut from now on. Keep up the great work Jeff.

name: mxv 2015
text: This is a new Pizza Hut location, moved from up the street. Much more modern place,the food is Pizza Hut, same as all other Pizza Huts. The service is what makes the difference between locations. I had a problem with my order and Mike …More

name: Bonnie Moretti
text: Had my grandchildren over and they wanted pizza.  I loved Pizza Hut so I gave a call for delivery.  I was told they don't deliver to me and do not know which store would.  This store is 1.7 miles from my door.  I called back and asked again …More

name: Jason Heinrich
text: I ordered a medium 3 topping pizza for carry out on my way home from work and was told the total would be $16 and Change.  When I showed up to get my pizza there were 2 advertisements for a large 3 topping pizza for $7.99.  The gentleman …More

name: KnightofWU
text: This was the Pizza Hut that broke the proverbial camel's back. The pizza wasn't fully cooked, the man at the counter was really dodgy and anxious as we talked to him, and this will sound weird but the drink machine smelled. How does a drink …More

name: Candy Gardner
text: I usually hate pizza hut because their pizza is so greasy but oh my goodness.....for a pizza being ordered at 10:30 pm...it was amazing! Great service too! You guys nailed it! Thank you so much! Best pizza ive had in a very long time!

name: Randall Simmons
text: Have been ordering from this location for months since we moved to this part of CO. The people here are always amazing, they give great customer care! They also make some amazing pizzas and everything always arrives hot and delicious!

name: Chris Smith
text: Great hot personal pan pizza in a very short time. Great price. However, when I asked for a glass of water to a company yet the person at the register said they would be willing to sell me an Aquafina bottle at $2. If I had wanted Aquafina …More

name: Marhta Abbate
text: Everything is perfect: the sauce, the fresh mozzarella, the crust. I can't wait to get back here again soon.

name: nabille lopez
text: Employees are rude and awful. Definitely not a place to go if youre having a bad day. Mike is rude as hell, cancelled my order because my phone number was wrong but my address was right as well as my email. Instead of telling me they will …More

name: Greg Hull
text: My favorite place to get a good meal. Nobody makes a better pizza

name: It’s Eli
text: Waited for 30 minutes for service and then got up and left.  Sad.

name: Cailey Cogburn
text: They are always quick to make my order and their drivers are quick to deliver with a kind attitude! I will order from this store any time, they always get my order correct and the food is perfect when it gets to my door!

name: Sunshined Beauty
text: Just ordered a pizza, some jalapeno poppers and bread sticks, took them over an hour to deliver and when we called and they offered to take off $5 for it being late, we asked them to let the driver know which they never did and the driver was unfriendly as well. No personality at all. Very rude. I won't order for here again.

name: Hope Quinn
text: I’ve been to this Pizza Hut before and they have been awesome with carry out orders what happened today was ridiculous. I ordered a personal pan pizza bread sticks and a two liter. I get there at my pick up time 1:05pm no one even comes up …More

text: Thank you to the manager tonight that made my pizza again. I really appreciate it.

name: Gordon Fairty
text: I came in to order a pizza and waited at the counter for a few minutes before even seeing anyone.  I could hear some people talking back in the kitchen and eventually someone came up to take my order.  Pizza was just too greasy for me.  I'd rather just go up the street to Anthony's, now that's some top notch pizza.

text: this place has great pizza! Not to mention one of the best customer service expierences ever.! Even though there were some mis understandings on my end... not theirs....they still managed to make it great! Thank you so much! I will refer anyone to this place! Its is GREAT!

text: Worst experience ever! I came to pick up my pizza and they didn't even make it yet! So I had to sit there for 20 Minutes, when it did come out it took like 7 minutes for anyone to cut it, and it didn't even have any crust flavoring, guess …More

text: Wish there was less than one star. This place reminds me of why I hate Pizza Hut and will officially never eat at one again. Literally the only reason I went to this one today is because it’s feet from my apartment building. That should say …More

Pizza arrived cold, hardly any sauce, or toppings,  and the cheese didn't even cover the top. I was so sad. Never going back to this location.

name: Eric Neal
text: I called there and Tim answered. I kept asking if someone still worked there and he kept telling me he doesn't speak spanish. Seriously?! I was trying to be very clear but I'm from Massachusetts born and raised. I definitely don't speak spanish either. This guy was just rude, so I definitely did not order any pizza.

text: I should have learned by the 2nd and 3rd time. I live exactly 0.6 miles away and it took an hour and a half. The second ti,e they forgot the extra sauce I paid for ... LAST time I ask for extra sauce but get extra pepperoni so greasy I …More

text: Really good costumer service..the gentleman who took my order was very nice and friendly.... :)

text: Great pizza, and even better service. I lost my receipt and their employee Tim came through like a champ and got me taken care of. That dude has middle management written all over him.

text: Ordered delivery because I wasn't feeling well. This place is literally a mile from my house. It took 45 mins and everything was cold. The boxes were in terrible shape, clearly someone put something heavy on top of my pizza. My oven is preheating so I can have a warm meal. Dominos is cheaper, further away and faster. Lesson Learned.

text: I have never had such terrible experience with any delivery service however this location never ceases to surprise me. An tonight was so bad I couldn't help but make a review (which is unusual for me being that 4 years in the food business …More
